org.lwjgl.opencl
Class CLPlatform

java.lang.Object
  org.lwjgl.PointerWrapperAbstract
      org.lwjgl.opencl.CLPlatform
All Implemented Interfaces:
PointerWrapper
public final class CLPlatform
extends PointerWrapperAbstract

This class is a wrapper around a cl_platform_id pointer.

Author:
Spasi
